verses.roman:
eka eka paricchedera kathā--aneka-prakāra
mukhya-mukhya kahiluṅ, kathā nā yāya vistāra

synonyms: eka eka paricchedera—of every chapter; kathā—description; aneka-prakāra—different varieties; mukhya-mukhya kahiluṅ—I have repeated only the principal ones; kathā—discussions; nā yāya—not possible; vistāra—expansion.
translation: In every chapter there are various topics, but I have selected only those that are principal, for not all of them could be described again.
